column3:
Maru is gazing sadly at an empty crate.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Survey the area from the designated location and defeat any manjusaka that appear.
Deliver the bundle of thick manjusaka vines to Maru.
Listen, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>─an important part of ridin' is bein' ready to ride at all times. And that means keepin' up regular maintenance on your cart.
It so happens that we're runnin' low on certain spare parts, and gettin' more of 'em... Well, let's just say it's best suited for fightin' types, eh? Like you!
If you could swing by the old Hamsa Hatchery an' fetch me some manjusaka vines, I'd be much obliged.
You're gonna have to take down some small fry to get to the gnarlier chap, but his are the vines we want. A healthy handful should do!
A gnarled manjusaka unfurls before you!
These are perfect! Our hippos appreciate your kindness. As do I.
You see, these vines are what stand between the yoke and our precious hippos' skin─an' believe you me, you never wanna see a blistered hippo.
We always make sure to keep fresh vines in reserve, but go through 'em quicker than you might think. I hope you won't mind fetchin' some again when the time comes...
